name: Cooking kits
description:
Disclaimer: The game is a little bit broken, started way too late. Hopefully you have some fun playing it! :)

Some retro SNES like game. Not trying to follow the jam theme.

Move around the restaurant with arrow or WASD keys and deliver orders before the time runs out. Gather items by jumping on them. Hop around the place and get a plate to put the necessary ingredients on. Crates filled with food are scattered around the area, so look carefully. Then find an oven and cook the food. Once cooked, bring the dish to the awaiting customer. Be careful of what you put on the plate as you will not be able to remove ingredients that are wrong. You will need to throw the plate in the trash and start over.
